body_html:
Hm, are integer types even supported on GPU? There's this line in register_types

// Call "m" on all types supported on GPU.
#define TF_CALL_GPU_NUMBER_TYPES(m) \
  TF_CALL_half(m) TF_CALL_float(m) TF_CALL_double(m)
body_text:
Hm, are integer types even supported on GPU? There's this line in register_types
// Call "m" on all types supported on GPU.
#define TF_CALL_GPU_NUMBER_TYPES(m) \
  TF_CALL_half(m) TF_CALL_float(m) TF_CALL_double(m)
body:
Hm, are integer types even supported on GPU? There's [this line](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/a304537954a865752ad1b18461e6bd67b36082db/tensorflow/core/framework/register_types.h#L171) in register_types

```
// Call "m" on all types supported on GPU.
#define TF_CALL_GPU_NUMBER_TYPES(m) \
  TF_CALL_half(m) TF_CALL_float(m) TF_CALL_double(m)

```
